holidays.title: Independent Accommodations Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the millions of independent and privately owned accommodations across the globe!

holidays.title: Commonwealth Covenant Day
holidays.description: Join the festive roadside activities as you celebrate Commonwealth Covenant Day today.

holidays.title: Day of Remembrance for Truth and Justice
holidays.description: Learn the history of this day and how you can contribute to honoring the victims' memories.

holidays.title: Flatmates Day
holidays.description: Have a great flatmate? Here’s some ways to express your gratitude and appreciation.

holidays.title: International Day For Achievers
holidays.description: To the ones selflessly striving to make our world a better place, we celebrate you!

holidays.title: International Day for the Right to the Truth concerning Gross Human Rights Violations and for the Dignity of Victims
holidays.description: We've created a list of three simple ways to observe this day.

holidays.title: National Adverse Drug Event Awareness Day
holidays.description: Let us learn more about the fourth-leading cause of death in America: adverse drug events.

holidays.title: National Cheesesteak Day
holidays.description: Much like national liberty itself, the cheesesteak is elegant, necessary, pure, and was born in Philadelphia.

holidays.title: National Chocolate Covered Raisin Day
holidays.description: As one of America’s favorite candies it is no stranger to the spotlight.

holidays.title: National Cocktail Day
holidays.description: Whip up a glass of your favorite cocktail and get your party on!

holidays.title: National Each Person is A Person of Worth Day
holidays.description: We've got the best ideas to observe this day — because you’re worth it!

holidays.title: National Stephanie Day
holidays.description: Know a Stephanie? Today is a terrific day to commemorate them and share their name's origins.

holidays.title: World Tuberculosis Day
holidays.description: Tuberculosis is curable, but can go undetected for years, so it’s important to spread awareness.

holidays.title: Peyton Manning’s Birthday
holidays.description: This exceptional athlete makes running across a field seem like the ultimate dream.

holidays.title: The Undertaker’s Birthday
holidays.description: His enduring involvement in wrestling has ensured that The Undertaker is known around the world!
